text: (Nchimwene) jwatite (kwa achimmasyeto): “Ana abali jenu jaliji uli pandema jamwannyengaga Yusufu jwalakwe akakusaka?” Wanganyao watite: “Allah ayitalichisye (yaulemwa wa Yusufu)! Pangali yakusakala iliyose yatwaimanyi kukwakwe.” Wankwao wakuchimbika (anduna) watite: “Sambano nipaimanyukwiche kusyene yakuona. Une nijunannyengaga jwalakwe akakusaka, soni jwalakwe chisimu chene juli mwa wandu wakuonaonape.”
